name: TestExplainVisual
cases: create table t(a int, b int, index ia(a));
create table t2(a int, b int);
explain format = 'visual' select sum(t.a) from t join t2
explain format = 'visual' select a from t use index (ia) where a > 100
explain format = 'visual' select a from t use index () where a > 100
explain format = 'visual' with cte1 as (select a, b from t), cte2 as (select a, b from t2) select * from cte1 join cte2 on cte1.a = cte2.a
explain format = 'visual' WITH RECURSIVE cte (n) AS(  SELECT 1  UNION ALL  SELECT n + 1 FROM cte WHERE n < 5)SELECT * FROM cte;
